title: Nintendo’s Switch Lite is $30 off today at Rakuten
text:
Only the best deals on Verge-approved gadgets get the Good Deals stamp of approval, so if you're looking for a deal on your next gadget or gift from major retailers like Amazon, Walmart, Best Buy, Target, and more, this is the place to be. For more information, see our ethics policy .

If you’re someone who’s looking for a little discount on the new Nintendo Switch Lite that released last Friday, you may want to check out today’s sale event at Rakuten, which was tipped off by Slickdeals.

All Switch Lite color variations are $30 off (gray, turquoise, yellow), bringing the cost for the handheld console down to $169.99 (price before tax is usually $199.99). To get this discount, enter SAVE15 at checkout.

As is usually the case with Rakuten’s site-wide sales, you can save money on almost anything it offers with the same offer code. So, if you have your eye on something else, like Sony’s WH1000XM3 wireless headphones, it should work fine. Also, keep in mind that while Rakuten’s site-wide sale is set to last until tomorrow night, inventory of Switch Lite consoles may sell out before then.
description: You can save $30 on Nintendo’s new Switch Lite handheld console. This isn’t a huge discount, but it’s currently the best price. To get this deal, you’ll have to visit Rakuten, then enter the promo code SAVE15 at checkout.
